projects.title: audioBK
projects.description: audioBK is a demo e-commerce web application designed for the sale of audio devices such as headphones, speakers, and earphones. This user-friendly and responsive platform is built using modern technologies like React, Node.js, and MongoDB to provide a seamless shopping experience for customers. The visually appealing design and easy-to-use interface make it simple for users to browse, filter, and purchase products with ease. The platform includes a secure payment gateway, real-time inventory management, and an efficient order fulfillment process. As a full-stack developer, I was responsible for the development and deployment of the entire application, including the front-end design, back-end logic, and database management. audioBK is a prime example of my ability to turn an idea into a fully-functional and scalable web application.
projects.shortDec: audioBK is a demo e-commerce web app with a user-friendly interface and real-time inventory management. I developed the entire app as a full-stack developer.
